channel.title: Half Life on Steam
channel.description: I put my code in for HL, and it came up on my list (I had it on disk, but something was wrong with the uninstaller, so I decided to get HL off of steam.) It finished downloading and now HL is running like crap. But it only does that for the steam version. The disk version runs fine. Any ideas as to why it is doing this? I really enjoy the game, and it is basically unplayable, even at the lowest settings.
